thread.title: Antoine Griezmann agrees to join Man United: He'll move in the summer - reports
thread.title_full: Antoine Griezmann agrees to join Man United: He'll move in the summer - reports

title: Antoine Griezmann agrees to join Man United: He'll move in the summer - reports
text:
Antoine Griezmann agrees to join Man United: He'll move in the summer - reports ANTOINE GRIEZMANN has reportedly agreed to join Manchester United in the summer.   France international has been heavily linked with a move to Old Trafford, with the striker topping Jose Mourinho’s transfer wishlist. 
And according to French outlet Canal+, the 25-year-old has agreed to join the Red Devils at the end of the season. 
They say United will pay Griezmann's £85m (€100m) release clause. The 50 transfers that shook the Premier League Tuesday, 3rd January 2017 THE Premier League transfer window is open once again - could we see more shocking transfers similar to these? 1 / 50 GETTY 50. David Luiz - Luiz's return to Chelsea came as one of the biggest surprises of the 2016 summer window “”
